description: Watch Kubernetes clusters for resource changes in real-time

fields.label: Integration Name
fields.help: A friendly name for this integration

fields.label: Tags
fields.help: JSON array of tags for filtering (can be empty [])

fields.label: Clusters
fields.help: JSON array of Kubernetes clusters to watch

fields.label: Namespaces (optional)
fields.help: JSON array of namespaces to watch. Leave empty to watch all namespaces.

fields.label: Resources to Watch
fields.help: JSON object specifying which resources to watch. Defaults to all if not specified.
